title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 281.4 - Paper requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 281.4 - Paper requirements

State Regulations

All papers submitted to the commissioner in connection with
an appeal shall be in typewritten form on white paper 81/2 by 11 inches in
size, and endorsed with the name, post office address and telephone number of
the party submitting the same, or, if a party is represented by counsel, with
the name, post office address and telephone number of the party' s
attorney. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
281.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
